name: Escape Your Birthday
description:
You hate birthdays.
Yours was yesterday.
Today you woke up, and its still your birthday.

ESCAPE.

This game was made for Low Effort Jam #14
Theme: Birthday

> Controls

[WASD] to move
[Mouse] to look around
[Left mouse button] to interact with objects.
[ESC] to remove mouse focus from the game.

Your objective is to exit the room through the green door.

The point mechanic is a bit laggy. stay still when trying to interact with objects

HINTS (if you are stuck)
  • There is a secret mechanic regarding colors and inflatable birthday decorations
  • Special things have special colors

Spoiler section:

  • items are revealed depending on which color is active in the room
  • the big candle can be burnt down
  • the red drawer requires a key
  • the laptop can show the code when an item is used on it
  • there is something yellow behind the abstract picture
  • there is something inside the wine
  • there is an green object near the yellow baloon
  • a knife normally can cut things... including rugs
